p: In another study, Yaren et al. (2017) reported a multiplexed system based on RT-LAMP capable of detecting ZIKV, DENV, and CHIKV in human samples and mosquito homogenate [ 27]. Their assay was able to detect ZIKV directly in urine and plasma without RNA extraction or pretreatment. In contrast, for reactions using mosquito samples, it was necessary to treat samples with ammonia and ethanol before applying them to the LAMP reaction mixture [ 27].
